parameters.content:
## AI Beauty Brand Hashtag Generator

This workflow helps beauty and skincare brands generate highly relevant, high-performing hashtags using AI, real website content, and current social media trends.

Instead of relying on generic hashtag lists, the workflow analyzes the brand’s own website, understands its positioning, tone, and audience, and then generates a balanced mix of branded, niche, and trending hashtags. It also researches platform-specific trends to ensure the hashtags are timely and appropriate for LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, and X (Twitter).

All inputs are collected through a simple form, making this workflow easy to use for non-technical users, agencies, and marketers. The final hashtag set is automatically saved to Google Sheets for reuse, planning, or collaboration.

### How it works
The workflow starts with a form where the user provides brand details and a website URL. The website is scraped and analyzed using AI to extract brand insights. Based on this analysis, AI generates structured hashtags with categories and popularity levels. A second AI step fetches currently trending hashtags per platform. Finally, the results are formatted and saved to Google Sheets.

### Setup steps
1. Connect Google Gemini credentials  
2. Connect Google Sheets credentials. 
Make a copy of https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1oY7H9l2odzTL73LiJDbQ2lkned_YRtS1__ORfluZtwg/edit?gid=0#gid=0.
3. Add your Google Sheet ID and sheet name  
4. Update SerpAPI credentials for trend research  
5. Activate the workflow and open the form URL

## User Input & Website Scraping











Collects brand details through a form and fetches the brand’s website content using an HTTP request. This provides the raw data needed for brand analysis and ensures hashtags are based on real brand context.

## Brand Analysis














Analyzes website content using AI to extract brand positioning, tone, key ingredients, values, and target audience. These insights guide the hashtag strategy instead of relying on generic prompts.

## Hashtag Generation

Generates structured hashtags aligned with the brand’s identity. Each hashtag includes category and popularity, ensuring a mix of branded, niche, and high-reach tags.

## Platform Trend Research

Finds currently trending hashtags for LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, and X using live search data. This ensures the output stays relevant and timely.

## Save Results

Formats the final hashtag list and saves it to Google Sheets with brand name, category, and timestamp for easy reuse and collaboration.
